Jx.Plugin.DataView.GroupFolder

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Plugin for DataViewallows folding/unfolding of the groups in the grouped dataview

Options

headerClass

The base for styling the header.  Gets ‘-open’ or ‘-closed’ added to it.
